sentences.sentence: Supporters of the idea believe a large number of WIMPS pass through the Earth every second.
sentences.translation: 这种理论的支持者相信每时每刻都有大量弱作用大质量粒子通过地球。

sentences.sentence: These annihilations are thought to occur when two WIMPs collide, generating gamma-rays which can be picked up by detectors such as those on board Fermi.
sentences.translation: 据称，在两个弱作用大质量粒子碰撞时会发生湮灭，并且放出伽马射线，类似费尔米卫星的探测器能够捕捉到这种信号。
